title: DDoSecrets publishes 410 GB of heap dumps, hacked from TeleMessage's archive server
summary:
💡
Update May 21, 2025: I've written a new detailed analysis of the heap dump dataset itself: TeleMessage customers include DC Police, Andreessen Horowitz, JP Morgan, and hundreds more

Update May 26, 2025: I've published the source code for TeleMessage Explorer: a new open source research
